mapper.sql: OrdersFDetail_Auto, Orders_Auto, Memo, CreditPerson, Orders_Status, CDT, MDT, IsAgent, AgentPerson, RoleID
mapper.select: select a.OrdersFDetail_Auto,a.Orders_Auto,a.Memo,a.Orders_Status,a.CDT,a.IsAgent,b.FName creditPerson,d.Memo roleName from OrdersFDetail(nolock) a left join v_Emp b on a.CreditPerson=b.User_Auto inner join Orders c On c.Orders_Auto=a.Orders_Auto left join ItemCode d on d.ItemType = 1062 and d.Num = a.RoleID where a.Orders_Auto=#{param} union all select 0 OrdersFDetail_Auto,a.DocPostID Orders_Auto,'' Memo,0 Orders_Status,null CDT,0 IsAgent,'' FName,c.Memo roleName from WorkFlowDoc(nolock) a left join Orders b On b.Orders_Auto=a.DocPostID left join ItemCode c on c.ItemType = 1062 and c.Num = a.RoleID where a.DocPostID=#{param} And a.[status]=0 And a.Memo='999' order by a.OrdersFDetail_Auto desc
